name: Blobs & Dices
description:
Blobs & Dices is a turn-based game, starring the almighty and evil blobs along with the main protagonist stickman. There are currently 42 levels to play along with multiple maps each with its own theme. In this game, everyone has armor and weapons, if you're lucky you can get a stickman with a katana!  However, these are all cosmetics and have no impact on the gameplay.

HOW TO PLAY:

1. Select your three support and attack moves (What they do is viewed with the book in the bottom left) and click play

2. Look at the right side, there will be a dice and whatever number is rolled, that is the number of moves you receive, you can click the reroll button below the support move button to reroll the dice, and you can only do it once per level!

3. Then you can click  1 of the buttons below, attack or support, support moves will be the moves chosen by you initially on the bottom row, attack was initially on the top row. Your objective is to destroy all the blobs in that level.

If you have chosen to select attack then you must drag the circle to the enemy you want to attack, if you chose support then you will be buffed and an icon will appear on your blue character.

4. Repeat

SOME SPECIAL ENEMIES:

Cup + Snowy Blob:

Appears in the early levels, can deal damage right before your turn starts, ignoring shields that have just expired

Nurse Blob:

Appears in the later levels, has some sort of healing ability.

Guard Blob:

Appears just before the beach levels, cannot be damaged by low damage attacks

Spade Blob:

Appears in the beach levels, reduces your damage when they hit you, you can remove this debuff by using any attack damage increase support move

Seaweed Blob:

Appears in the later beach levels, increases the damage you take when they hit you, you can remove this debuff by using any damage reduction support move

BOSS ENEMIES:

There are 2 boss enemies currently in the game, the boss versions of the guard and seaweed blobs. The guard boss guards the beach levels, appearing right before the first beach level. The seaweed boss acts as the "final" boss to this game, appearing in level 42!
